channel.title: Custom Items and NPCs Help Me Please
channel.description: Okay I'm using Project-Exile as a base. I've created npc models and weapon models for the server. I'm attempting to create a server based off of Mythology with Vampires and Lycans (Werewolfs) in it. But I can't seem to figure out how I would go about adding the model to the server.. I know the cache has all the models packed but Idk how to unpack them so I can add the models I need to add and repack. If someone could help me out I would be grateful for it. Thanks!

item.title: Custom Items and NPCs Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @Mystical_Wizard Mystical_Wizard
item.description:
@Mystical_Wizard wrote:

ReaperXScape:

Got Skype?

Yeah I will inbox you.

Read full topic
